get.summary: The default response from the API.
get.description:
The default response from the API.

If this endpoint does not respond, something is wrong.

get.summary: This endpoint allows you to fetch players.
get.description: This endpoint allows you to fetch players.

204.description: There was no data available for the given query.

400.description: Required request data was missing / invalid.

post.description:
Creates a new player.

Servers are expected to make a `GET` request for every joining player. If one of these requests
returns a `204` status code, the server should make a request to this endpoint to register the
player.

400.description: Required request data was missing / invalid.

401.description: You do not have access to this resource.

409.description: The request conflicts with the server's state. This can happen, for example, when trying to create a resource that already exists.

get.summary: This endpoint allows you to fetch a single player by their SteamID or (parts of their) name.
get.description: This endpoint allows you to fetch a single player by their SteamID or (parts of their) name.

204.description: There was no data available for the given query.

400.description: Required request data was missing / invalid.

patch.description:
Updates a player.

This route is reserved for CS2KZ servers!

Every time a map change happens, the server should make a request to this endpoint for every
player currently on the server.

Every time a player disconnects, the server should make a request to this endpoint for that
player.

400.description: Required request data was missing / invalid.

401.description: You do not have access to this resource.

get.summary: This endpoint allows you to fetch globally approved maps.
get.description: This endpoint allows you to fetch globally approved maps.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Only include maps created after this date.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Only include maps created before this date.

mappers.description: List of the players who created this map.

courses.description: List of courses on this map.

filesize.description: The filesize of this map in bytes.

created_on.description: Timestamp of when this map was initially approved.

updated_on.description: Timestamp of when this map was last updated.

204.description: There was no data available for the given query.

400.description: Required request data was missing / invalid.

It is intended to be used by admins and the map approval team.

get.summary: This endpoint allows you to fetch jumpstats.
get.description: This endpoint allows you to fetch jumpstats.

204.description: There was no data available for the given query.

400.description: Required request data was missing / invalid.

post.summary: This endpoint is used by servers to send jumpstats.
post.description:
This endpoint is used by servers to send jumpstats.

Servers are supposed to fetch the player's PBs when they join and only make requests to this
route with new PBs, but the endpoint will still validate the jumpstat, so it is expected to
return a 409 occasionally.

400.description: Required request data was missing / invalid.

401.description: You do not have access to this resource.

409.description: The request conflicts with the server's state. This can happen, for example, when trying to create a resource that already exists.

get.summary: This is where the frontend will redirect users to when they click "login".
get.description:
This is where the frontend will redirect users to when they click "login".
Steam will redirect them back to the API to confirm their identity.

get.summary: This is where Steam will redirect a user back to after logging in.
get.description:
This is where Steam will redirect a user back to after logging in.
We verify that the request actually comes from steam and give the user a cookie containing
a JWT.

AuthRequest.description: This data is sent by servers to refresh their JWT.

plugin_version.description: The CS2KZ version the server is currently running.

stage.description: The stage of the map this course corresponds to.

mappers.description: List of the players who created this course.

filters.description: List of filters that apply to this course.

removed_mappers.description: List of old mappers to be removed.

removed_filters.description: List of filter IDs to be removed.

filter_updates.description: List of updates for existing filters.

CourseWithFilter.description: Combination of a course and filter.

map_id.description: The ID of the map the course belongs to.

map_name.description: The name of the map the course belongs to.

map_stage.description: The stage of the map this course corresponds to.

stage.description: The stage of the map this course corresponds to.

mappers.description: List of the players who created this course.

filters.description: List of filters that apply to this course.

mappers.description: List of players who have contributed to creating this map.

courses.description: List of courses on this map.

CreatePlayerRequest.description:
A new player.

This is expected to be sent by a CS2KZ server when a player joins for the first time.

map_id.description: The ID of the map the record was set on.

map_stage.description: The stage the record was set on.

teleports.description: The amount of teleports used for setting this records.

time.description: The time taken to finish this run.

ip_address.description: The server's IP address and port.

has_teleports.description: Whether this filter applies to runs with teleports.

tier.description: The difficulty of the course with this filter.

ranked.description: Whether the course is ranked with this filter.

mappers.description: List of the players who created this map.

courses.description: List of courses on this map.

filesize.description: The filesize of this map in bytes.

created_on.description: Timestamp of when this map was initially approved.

updated_on.description: Timestamp of when this map was last updated.

teleports.description: The amount of teleports used in this run.

ip_address.description: The server's IP address and port.

Session.description:
A player session.

This route is reserved for CS2KZ servers!

Anytime a player connects, a session is started. This session ends either when the map changes
or when the player disconnects.

workshop_id.description: The map's new Steam Workshop ID.

removed_mappers.description: List of old mappers to be removed.

removed_courses.description: List of course IDs to be removed.

course_updates.description: List of updates to existing courses.
